@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+import { Dimensions, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
+import { colors } from '../../../themes/colors/Colors';
+
+const { width } = Dimensions.get('window');
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+    container: {
+        flex: 1,
+        justifyContent: 'space-evenly',
+        alignItems: 'center',
+        backgroundColor: colors.background,
+        paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    },
+    logo: {
+        width: width * 0.7,
+        height: width * 0.7,
+        maxWidth: 350,
+        maxHeight: 350,
+        resizeMode: 'contain',
+    },
+    buttonContainer: {
+        width: '85%',
+        alignItems: 'center',
+    },
+    button: {
+        width: '100%',
+        height: 50,
+        justifyContent: 'center',
+        alignItems: 'center',
+        backgroundColor: colors.secondary,
+        paddingVertical: 10,
+        paddingHorizontal: 30,
+        borderRadius: 10,
+        shadowColor: colors.secondary,
+        shadowOffset: {
+            width: 0,
+            height: 3,
+        },
+        shadowOpacity: 0.3,
+        shadowRadius: 4.65,
+        elevation: 8,
+    },
+    buttonText: {
+        color: colors.white,
+        fontSize: 18,
+        fontWeight: 'bold',
+        textAlign: 'center',
+    },
+    buttonContainerText: {
+        marginTop: 20,
+        color: colors.darkGray,
+        fontSize: 14,
+        fontWeight: '500',
+        textAlign: 'center',
+    }
+});
+
+export default styles;
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+import { Dimensions, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
+import { colors } from '../../../themes/colors/Colors';
+
+const { width } = Dimensions.get('window');
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+    container: {
+        flex: 1,
+        alignItems: 'center',
+        justifyContent: 'center',
+        justifyContent: 'space-around', // Distribui o espaço entre os itens
+        alignItems: 'center', // Mantém o alinhamento horizontal
+        backgroundColor: colors.background,
+        paddingHorizontal: 20,
+    },
+    logo: {
+        width: width * 0.7,
+        height: width * 0.7,
+        maxWidth: 350,
+        maxHeight: 350,
+        resizeMode: 'contain',
+    },
+    buttonContainer: {
+        width: '85%',
+        width: '100%',
+        paddingHorizontal: 20, // Adiciona o padding que estava no container
+        alignItems: 'center',
+    },
+    button: {
+        width: '100%',
+        height: 50,
+        justifyContent: 'center',
+        alignItems: 'center',
+        backgroundColor: colors.secondary,
+        paddingVertical: 10,
+        paddingHorizontal: 30,
+        borderRadius: 10,
+        shadowColor: colors.secondary,
+        shadowOffset: {
+            width: 0,
+            height: 3,
+        },
+        shadowOpacity: 0.3,
+        shadowRadius: 4.65,
+        elevation: 8,
+    },
+    buttonText: {
+        color: colors.white,
+        fontSize: 18,
+        fontWeight: 'bold',
+        textAlign: 'center',
+    },
+    buttonContainerText: {
+        marginTop: 20,
+        color: colors.darkGray,
+        fontSize: 14,
+        fontWeight: '500',
+        textAlign: 'center',
+    }
+});
+
+export default styles;
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+import { Dimensions, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
+import { colors } from '../../../themes/colors/Colors';
+
+const { width } = Dimensions.get('window');
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+    container: {
+        flex: 1,
+        justifyContent: 'space-around', // Distribui o espaço entre os itens
+        alignItems: 'center', // Mantém o alinhamento horizontal
+        backgroundColor: colors.background,
+    },
+    logo: {
+        width: width * 0.7,
+        height: width * 0.7,
+        maxWidth: 350,
+        maxHeight: 350,
+        resizeMode: 'contain',
+    },
+    slogan: {
+        fontSize: 18,
+        fontWeight: '500',
+        color: colors.darkGray,
+        textAlign: 'center',
+        paddingHorizontal: 20,
+        lineHeight: 24,
+    },
+    buttonContainer: {
+        width: '100%',
+        paddingHorizontal: 20, // Adiciona o padding que estava no container
+        alignItems: 'center',
+    },
+    button: {
+        width: '100%',
+        height: 50,
+        justifyContent: 'center',
+        alignItems: 'center',
+        backgroundColor: colors.secondary,
+        paddingVertical: 10,
+        paddingHorizontal: 30,
+        borderRadius: 10,
+        shadowColor: colors.secondary,
+        shadowOffset: {
+            width: 0,
+            height: 3,
+        },
+        shadowOpacity: 0.3,
+        shadowRadius: 4.65,
+        elevation: 8,
+    },
+    buttonText: {
+        color: colors.white,
+        fontSize: 18,
+        fontWeight: 'bold',
+        textAlign: 'center',
+    },
+    buttonContainerText: {
+        marginTop: 20,
+        color: colors.darkGray,
+        fontSize: 14,
+        fontWeight: '500',
+        textAlign: 'center',
+    }
+});
+
+export default styles;
